title: Friends and I are stuck in lobby
body: friends and I are stuck in a rank 5v5 flex lobby, cant start game or leave, relogging doesnt fix it. We have tried everything and its been about an hour. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
I currently have this issue aswell although im stuck in a lobby by myself. it's a 5v5 flex lobby but i cant change to to blind pick,ranked or any of the other gamemodes.
I can play solo but no join other lobbys and friends cant join my lobby.

That is really strange!  Is this still an issue?

I reached out to our tech team, and they're actively investigating this right now.  If this is happening right now, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or live chat, we really want to look at a live case of this.
I am currently having this issue.

I am currently having this issue, rebooting my computer did not fix it. I am currently stuck in a lobby with my friend. i am not the lobby owner so i cannot start the game. if someone invite me for a game, i get a message telling me to try again later. if i reboot my pc / relaunch the client, when i log in i get thrown in the lobby again. appened after waiting in lobby with said friend for many hours.

Current patch 7.23 NA.
~~Edit: Getting the league of legends installation file and repairing the LoL installation with it seems to have fixed it.~~
Edit2: Nevermind, it did not work. as soon i went to start a new game, back at the ~~fucking~~ lobby. Gonna uninstall then reinstall and give news.

Edit3: unistalled league completly, installed back, didnt work. ran CCLeaner with CCEnchancer to clear both the registry and temp files, didnt work. tried on a different computer with a different league installation, didnt work. I am out of ideas, issuing a support ticket.
